content.text:
# American Statistical Association Founders Award

The American Statistical Association (ASA) Founders Award is presented by the association to members who have rendered distinguished service to the ASA over a long period of timeâ€”often in a variety of leadership roles. Members who have made substantial contributions to the association's objectives and whose influence has lasted beyond their immediate tenure are eligible for the Founders Award. Along with fellowships, the Founders Award is one of the highest honors presented by the ASA. Recipients of the award are listed below.

* Fred C. Leone
